event.title: Crestora'25
event.theme: Beyond Limits ‚Äì A Space Odyssey of Personality Development
event.organized_by: Personality Development Association, MIT Campus, Anna University

rounds.name: Team Introduction
rounds.description: A 24-hour online competition (Oct 18-19) is being held for teams to creatively introduce themselves in any format, such as a video, website, or meme. Original works must be submitted via the provided Google Form link.
rounds.extended_description: This is a comprehensive round description that contains detailed information about the round requirements, evaluation criteria, and important guidelines for participants. The round will test various skills including creativity, problem-solving, and teamwork. Participants should prepare thoroughly and bring all necessary materials. The evaluation will be based on multiple criteria including presentation quality, innovation, and adherence to guidelines.

rounds.name: Once Upon a Time...
rounds.description: A creative writing challenge celebrating imagination and originality through spontaneous storytelling prompts.

rounds.name: MeteoSolve
rounds.description: A PPT presentation round where participants can present their innovative solutions for the given problem statement related to weather, climate and sustainability

rounds.name: Mimik Talk
rounds.description: Participants mimic a TED Talk speaker's tone, gestures, and expression while speaking on a totally different topic.

rounds.name: Quiz Whizzz
rounds.description: A multi-round general quiz featuring a wide variety of questions across various domains like entertainment, sports, science, technology, mythology, business and much more!
rounds.extended_description:
This Quiz will consist of 4 rounds.
Score System and Rules for each round will be informed as the event progresses.
The Points that you score throughout the Quiz is your Final Score for the round.
The Quizmaster's decision will be final and binding.

rounds.name: Channel Surfing
rounds.description: An improvisational performance event where participants act out spontaneous TV channel scenes using humor and wit.

rounds.name: Pixel Pitch
rounds.description: Teams pitch a creative app or gadget that solves real-life problems, judged on creativity, feasibility, and presentation.

rounds.name: Market Mavericks.
rounds.description: A virtual investing challenge simulating real-world trading decisions and reacting to market news in real time.

rolling_events.name: Vibretto
rolling_events.description: A four-round, music-themed event featuring song guessing, lyric recall, and Pictionary challenges promoting teamwork.

rolling_events.name: Meme & Reel Contest
rolling_events.description: Online Instagram contest celebrating humor and creativity through original memes and short reels.
